meanings.definition: A large metal bin for holding refuse.
meanings.sent1: The dumpsters behind the restaurant were overflowing with trash.
meanings.sent2: The garbage truck emptied the dumpsters early in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The raccoons had a party in the dumpsters last night.
meanings.sent4: The dumpsters stood like silent sentinels in the alley.
meanings.sent5: The smell coming from the dumpsters was unbearable.

meanings.definition: To discard or dispose of something in a careless or hasty manner.
meanings.sent1: Please do not dumpsters your old clothes, donate them instead.
meanings.sent2: He decided to dumpsters all the junk in his garage before moving.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally dumpsters her keys in the trash can.
meanings.sent4: After the breakup, he wanted to dumpsters all memories of her.
meanings.sent5: The company had to dumpsters the faulty products to avoid a recall.
